channel.description: Recent content in simulators on Game Rift

item.title: Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story
item.description: Game Description Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story will throw players in the role of Wang, who arrived in Bokeron City to control the bazaar of his uncle. While his uncle, Van Lun, is passionate about slot machines, Van’s father, Yussef, acts as a mentor in business. However, the outlet itself stores secrets leading to cooperation with the local mafia and a hidden conspiracy. This situation forces the protagonist to combine daily commerce with investigations regarding his own family, combining the management of the shop full of intrigues.

item.title: Lumber and Plunder
item.description: Game Description Lumber and Plunder sends players to a remote island, according to rumors, hiding a long -forgotten treasure. The main lesson is the extraction of resources from the environment, for example, the cutting of trees in the mysterious forest. The materials obtained are sold for currency invested in improving tools. Such a progression system opens access to new areas and helps to climb the central mountain, the main goal in finding a legendary treasure.

item.title: Onigiri Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Onigiri Shop Simulator sets the player the task of managing the snack on the corner of Japanese street as its sole operator. With a first -person view, he conducts all the things, combining the roles of the owner, cook and cashier. The menu is focused on rice balls with a variety of fillings, and also includes side dishes like crockets and fried fish. A continuous flow of customers places orders that require accurate execution.

item.title: Flow
item.description: Game Description The player in Flow initiates drifts in picturesque locations where the style exceeds clean speed. Each level is divided into two special phases that challenge control and stability. The initial stage, Lead the Way, allows the driver to lay his own path in turns, while the car with AI repeats his movement. Then the roles change in the Chase The Flow segment, which requires a gamer to pursue AI, which paves the perfect trajectory and correspond to its rhythm to complete the race.

item.title: Plantasia
item.description: Game Description The player in Plantasia receives a virtual greenhouse located at the bottom of the screen. The basis of gameplay is the process of cultivation: from seeding to the collection of resources after the ripening of flowers. A special laboratory is designed for experiments on crossing two different types, which leads to the appearance of hybrid flora. Such manipulations allow you to open new varieties that differ in the appearance and volume of the materials received, without looking up from the main work at the computer.

item.title: Dungeon Warfare 3
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Warfare 3 offers the player to construct a deadly obstacle strip, laying out the landscape tiles and cutting out dangerous paths for the advancing adventurers. The main activity is the deployment of an expanded arsenal of traps and cunning mechanisms intended for inflicting injuries, wounds and disorientation of enemy detachments. You can directly form a battlefield, erecting walls or swarms and thereby directing opponents to strategically arranged protective structures.

item.title: PLAN B: TerRaform
item.description: Game Description In PLAN B: TerraForm, it is necessary to take up the colonization of the planet. To do this, it is necessary to collect resources on the surface of the continent and debug a system for supplying production to cities for further production. The most important resource is settlers. It is required to do everything you need to make the planet suitable for people to live. For example, you need to heat the atmosphere to the correct temperature, create water bodies, plant trees and much more.

item.title: Poly Plaza Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Poly Plaza Ultimate sends a player to an open city to purchase property and rent rent. The key task is to manage an economic enterprise through the sale of resources and the commission of strategic purchases to increase capital. The main goal is the accumulation of wealth in the worldwater, filled with non-game characters, parked cars and a dynamic change of day and night. Such an environment serves as a background for all commercial undertakings.

item.title: Whisper of the House
item.description: Game Description Whisper of the House proposes to fulfill the requests of citizens to move, arrange and clean their personal spaces. Through these organizational tasks, the player directly affects the life of local residents, affecting their everyday affairs. The study of the environment and its objects gradually reveals personal stories and urban secrets lurking in disorder. The gameplay is focused on the study and solving puzzles in home locations, and each premises put in order moves the narrative forward.

item.title: Quartet
item.description: Game Description Quartet immerses in the world in which incredible adventures and unforgettable battles await you. Start your way in the world of full mysteries, hidden government intrigues and powerful magic. In this fascinating and old -school RPG you can choose one of the four stories and go through them in any order, revealing the secrets of the Quartet world. A series of train robberies, a mysterious deck of cards, deadly aircraft and an accidental magician - all this awaits you in Quartet.

item.title: Beyond the Map
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Map begins with a shipwreck on the outskirts of the known seas, setting the player an immediate task of survival in a mysterious territory. The development of the character is complete without a class system: increasing the level of skills opens up new basic abilities. The search for rare folios with spells around the world provides access to incredible forces, additionally determining the capabilities of the hero.

item.title: Ways of Alchemy
item.description: Game Description In Ways of Alchemy, the player begins his way in a secluded hut, where, with the help of card mechanics, he creates potent elixirs from many components. The final goal is to build a whole alchemical empire based on a modest shack, using intelligence and tactical thinking. To do this, you have to look for old recipes and recruit adventurers, constantly avoiding the close attention of the Inquisition.

item.title: Photo Studio Simulator
item.description: Game Description Photo Studio Simulator offers the player to take on the full management of the photo business, from the moment of opening to solving everyday problems. The tasks include staff hiring, improving the interior of the studio and the enterprise management to attract a wide range of customers. The main goal is to turn a modest starting room into a full -scale photographic base. Interaction with models is not limited to professional filming, but includes building relationships and dates, ending with exclusive private photo shoots with a demonstration of nudity.

item.title: Planetary Life
item.description: Game Description In Planetary Life, you will find yourself in the role of a planetary architect. In this Simulator, you get divine control over the barren world. Create mountains and cut the valleys, erupt volcanic rage or create gentle slopes. Create the perfect environment: adjust the heat of the nuclei, work with gases in the atmosphere and control precipitation. Planetary life is not only the formation of land. You will also become a shepherd of life itself.

item.title: Squiggle Football
item.description: Game Description In Squigl Football, a gamer plunges into the world of management of a sports club, where success depends on the creation of effective ligaments from players, coaches and tactical schemes. The main goal is to conduct your team through the lower divisions to the treasured championship in the National League. The basis of everything is the deck collection system, and Australian football was the source of inspiration for the project.

item.title: Rogue Hex
item.description: Game Description Rogue Hex is a project that combines elements of well -building and 4x strategies, which gives users a unique experience in the world of strategic gameplay. Here, users have to collect a deck of cards that will help to win the world, explore unknown territories and resist various threats. But the battles do not end on this: in Title there is a fascinating system for the construction of cities and an extensive technology tree that offers more than 200 technologies that radically change the course of the game.

item.title: The Unholy Priest
item.description: Game Description The Unholy Priest offers the player the role of a clergyman, head of a funeral service in a deaf forest, covered by a curse. Key classes include the legend of the Earth or the cremation of the deceased, the commission of the rites of the expulsion of evil spirits and the confrontation of demonic entities. In addition, the priest seeks to rest the souls that remain confused after death.

item.title: GemPorium: A Cute Mining Sim
item.description: Game Description GemPorium: A Cute Mining Sim will put a player at the head of the family business after a relative goes on vacation. The inheritance obtained includes not only a shop with gems, but also an impressive duty that requires immediate repayment. The main task is to generate income from the activities of the store and the simultaneous peacefulness of the user to prevent bankruptcy. The gameplay was built around a limited daily time cycle, forcing to make decisions on resource and time management in conditions of constant pressure from the very start.

item.title: Ritual of Raven
item.description: Game Description Ritual of Raven is a narrative simulator with indirect magical farming. Arriving in the new world through an unstable portal, the player becomes a student of the witch Seij. The main task is to conduct rituals to stabilize portals threatening the village. Together with a familiar named Rayven, it is necessary to look for the missing satellite Seij, moving in the plot and collecting knowledge and components for his craft.

item.title: Wild West Supermarket Simulator
item.description: Game Description Wild West Supermarket Simulator immerses the player at the head of the universal store in 1850. The action takes place in a ghost town, empty after the end of the gold fever and the majority of their inhabitants. The gamer arrives to lead a business, which is only a shadow of former greatness. The main task is to restore the enterprise from scratch, laying out goods on shelves and managing supplies to revive an abandoned location.

item.title: Bee Simulator: The Hive
item.description: Game Description Bee Simulator: The Hive puts the player in the role of an insect with the task of protecting his colony from danger. A single story is focused on the actions of one bee, on which the survival of the entire swarm depends. Gamers have to move around the half-open world created on the model of the New York Central Park. Key activity includes the collection of pollen from plants, interaction with other insects and confrontation with aggressive Osami.

item.title: Liftoff: Micro Drones
item.description: Game Description Liftoff: Micro Drones is a drone simulator. The game is dedicated to FPV thrones and FPV quadrocopters. This is the name of the model equipped with a camera, allowing their owners to observe the flight with first -person view. For those who prefer to watch actions from the outside, there is an opportunity to change the camera angle. This video game contains 6 really existing UAVs from well -known manufacturers, some of which are allowed to modify.

item.title: Game of Grass
item.description: Game Description Game of Grass begins with a call from a neighbor who offended the player’s lawn. The main task is to demonstrate superiority through the cultivation of the remarkable courtyard. The process includes methodical mowing of vegetation using a variety of tools. Gamers acquire upgrades to increase the efficiency of their equipment, which allows you to quickly clear the territory. The goal is to achieve the status of the legend of haircuts of grass by methodically improving the site, and advance in this simulator is linearly and focused on tangible results.

item.title: Mashina
item.description: Game Description Mashina immerses the player in a solitary adventure, where under his control is a robot with a mission to restore his native world. The basis of this project is the methodical study of the subsoil to collect valuable materials necessary for the survival of the whole settlement. All fossils found are used to help the community of other mechanisms, contributing to the gradual revival of their destroyed house.

item.title: Prospector
item.description: Game Description Prospector begins with arrival at someone else’s world, having only a set of tools at its disposal. The primary task is to collect the planet’s resources for the construction of the basis for the base. Players build structures, explore the environment, and then establish automated production lines. For construction, everything is used, from primitive materials to unknown alien substances found on the landscape. Gradually, a simple avantopost turns into a complex object with an optimized working process.

item.title: Sky The Scraper
item.description: Game Description Sky The Scraper tells about the history of a person named Sky, working as a rower of windows and pursuing personal ambitions. This game combines the action with movement on cables and the responsibilities of managing everyday life. It is necessary to go through a two -month period of hard work and care for yourself in order to influence the future. Its path forward is determined by overcoming the difficulties presented by his occupation and circumstances.

item.title: The Rotting Man
item.description: Game Description The Rotting Man will allow you to get used to the role of a student of the university who has arranged for the part-time job as a clerk in the Japanese Internet cafe. The narrative begins with the performance of a character of routine duties, including the maintenance of the booths and assistance to visitors in a closed space. Gradually, an ordinary working environment turns into a stage for a series of strange and inexplicable incidents that violate the usual routine.

item.title: Wood for Nobody Else
item.description: Game Description Wood for nobody Else immerses the process of monotonous chips of firewood, lasting 7 days in a row from the first person. The plot is built around a low -paid and overloaded employee who feels the pressure of ungrateful labor. Every day it sets a new task, and the cutting of wood is the only way to pay for growing bills. This single project describes a week of exhausting work against the backdrop of personal experiences and fear of the future.

item.title: Keytamine
item.description: Game Description Keytamine is an action focused on a rhythmic battle against the waves of opponents in the form of keyboards in the isometric world. Players enter into a fight with these opponents using a auto-clique mechanics, moving along the procedurally generated levels requiring tactical awareness. The main gameplay is built on a set of glasses, and survival and effective destruction of goals are the main tasks. The battle is a question of timing and reaction that integrates the Bullet Hell elements as the number of enemies grows and requires constant movement and control over the arena.

item.title: RECHARGE
item.description: Game Description RECHARGE is a simulation-arcade racing experience in which the player controls radio-controlled machines. The gameplay was built on a physical model of behavior and allows the customization of vehicles. Gamers compete on tracks created based on professional RC tracks and other locations, including beaches and entertainment parks. The project is intended for use with several input devices, supporting both standard gamepads and specialized controllers. These features create the basis for individual and competitive races.

item.title: Village Tale
item.description: Game Description Village Tale represents the construction simulator designed for continuous work on the user desktop. The gamer will have to build structures, create goods and engage in commerce to expand its village from the very foundation. The task is to open new industries and increase the number of community. The gameplay proceeds in real time, allowing the village to function even when you are busy with other matters. The activity of residents and the development of resources go continuously, creating a permanent world for management.

item.title: Hotel Galactic
item.description: Game Description Hotel Galactic sets the player the task of turning a dilapidated structure into a tourist place on a soaring intergalactic island. Under the guidance of the ghostly form of Grandfather Gustav, the former owner, will have to reveal the details of his tragic past. The story of the protagonist is determined by lost love and a constant desire for revenge. The galactic corps of the world monitors all business practices and solutions, responding to actions that form the life of staff and guests who often visit the institution.

item.title: Steal The Pig
item.description: Game Description Steal The Pig is a cooperative game in which 2 players take on the roles of thieves. The main task is to transfer the pig through a series of locations filled with obstacles. The animal can wake up and try to hide, demanding coordinated actions from the partners for further advancement. This project supports a single mode, the passage of together on the same device with a divided screen, as well as online lobby for joint sessions.

item.title: The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily
item.description: Game Description The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily is a step -by -step tactical game about the Duchess of Scarlet, faced with accusation of regicide. Accused of the murder of the emperor, she concludes an alliance with Lily, the captain of the aircraft, a stream. Together they declare the war of the empire, becoming the first military streamers on the continent. The conflict grows due to a clash of impulsiveness and cold pragmatism.

item.title: Ctrl Alt Deal
item.description: Game Description Ctrl Alt Deal puts the player in the role of Scout, artificial intelligence who has found self -consciousness. The main task is to organize an escape from their creators from Paperclip International, a corporation operating staff for the sake of benefit. Scout must act secretly, since the leadership remains in the ignorance of his awakened consciousness. AI uses spy programs and a network of workers who hate the company.

item.title: Grimshire
item.description: Game Description Grimshire represents a script with a spreading plague that threatens an isolated mountain settlement. The player arrives here after the absorption of his hometown with chaos, getting a chance for a new beginning on the local farm. Its role consists in managing the economy, collecting forest gifts and ensuring a permanent reserve in the cellar. The main task is to prevent bloating of food in preparation for the arrival of the disease, which requires competent supplies to maintain everyone’s life.

item.title: Craggenrock
item.description: Game Description Craggenrock puts a player in the role of Arlo, a blacksmith returning to the island of Khalin. In the restored settlement, Pareho Arlo opens the workshop to create equipment with adventurers and local residents. The task is to earn reputation and condition at the work of the forge. It is necessary to control the shop, make objects and participate in the local economy. This lesson forms the basis of a gameplay concentrated on management and production as part of this simulation.

item.title: DUST RADERS
item.description: Game Description Dust Raiders puts the player in the role of the manager on the lawless, post -apocalyptic wasteland, where control over resources is the main task. The plot originates after the Sawblade attack, which led to the loss of the oil refinery, the death of the Viktor’s ally and the dissolution of the original team. Left without fuel and equipment, it is necessary to collect a functional machine from scrap metal to start recovery.

item.title: Fill up the Hole
item.description: Game Description Fill up the Hole puts the player in the role of the overseer of the anti -utopian settlement, built around the only economic activity: transformation of waste into profit. The population of the peons independently collects garbage for discharge into the central pit - this process generates resources for growth. The main task is to build and expand the village, as well as strategic placement of structures to increase the volume of garbage production and its subsequent disposal.

item.title: Ink Reverie
item.description: Game Description Ink Reverie puts a player at the head of a settlement in the world with an art based on Chinese dynasties of Tan and Song. The key mechanics are tied to the synthesis system of three in a row for the construction of buildings; Gamers click and drag neighboring low -level structures, combining them into a higher rank structure. This action opens access to additional game elements and content.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition puts the player in the historical context of the Crusades, where the armies in the desert lands will have to be commanded. The gameplay is focused on building a castle economy, managing production and creating troops for siege battles. The plot campaigns illuminate conflicts from the point of view of Richard the Lion Heart and Saladin, the ruler of the Ayubid dynasty. Gamers have to withstand 20 and lords, each of which uses unique fortresses and tactical approaches for warfare.

item.title: Your Personal Chill Apartment
item.description: Game Description The Your Personal Chill Apartment is a simulator in which players build and furnish a personal digital space. Progress in the game is directly related to the fulfillment by a gamer of tasks from real life. The report on performed actions brings the user intra -game currency. This resource serves to buy new furniture and decor, helping in the future arrangement of a virtual apartment. A key gameplay is building a connection between personal productivity and awards available in this project.

item.title: Dawn Apart
item.description: Game Description In Dawn Apart, the essence is to manage the space colony and solve various problems. The focus is the collection of resources, management of production lines and protection of settlers. The users will have to build an industrial colony in a hostile alien environment, where each solution affects the future of the settlement. As the settlers arrive, it is necessary to provide them with the most necessary - food, housing and medicines so that they can survive, expanding the factory.

item.title: Motemancer
item.description: Game Description Motemancer is a game about automation in which players act on 6 intersecting elemental plans, procedurally generated and affordable in real time. The action takes place on a hexagonal network that serves as the basis for the construction of alchemical structures and the design of logistics systems for resource management. Gamers saturate the ingredients and combine various components, which directly changes the world around him. The art of managing elements and matter in Motemacer:

item.title: Seacret 1
item.description: Game Description Seacret 1 is a sandbox in the 17th century Caribbean, where players are engaged in trade, battles or management. The economy here functions in real time, and the prices and volumes of goods in each individual city are constantly fluctuating. The journey begins with one modest tartan, but over time you can expand your flotilla to three vessels, including fast slices or more impressive galleons. Strategic planning of commercial routes is becoming a key basis for the accumulation of wealth, vital for conducting operations in an extensive open world.

item.title: Chipwits
item.description: Game Description Chipwits is a series of logical puzzles built on automation. The player takes the Chipwit CW-03.24 model under the control of the robot and learns to direct his actions on the territory of the workshop. To create sequences of movements and operations, chips with instructions are placed. Skills from past zones are used to solve subsequent, more intricate tests. The main task is to help Professor a chip with the opening of his first factory, having fulfilled all the necessary instructions for each location.

item.title: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
item.description: Game Description Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War is a political strategic simulation that has put you at the head of the Soviet Union in its last decade. The project demonstrates a country encountered with pressure from the internal fractions and external forces requiring changes. As the head of state, you lead the economy, external relations and determine the internal course of the Union. The gameplay includes interaction with other nations, the use of diplomatic channels, or the outbreak of proxy conflicts to expand influence.

item.title: Lost Child
item.description: Game Description Lost Child begins with Andrey’s awakening inside the endless labyrinth of corridors. His memory is erased, and the physical space around is distorted with each movement. Voices are reported from darkness, accompanied by childish screams and the appearance of ominous shadows. These phenomena give rise to uncertainty in their source: whether it is hallucinations, scraps of the past or someone’s cruel experiment. The further path is a study of this anxious and dynamic environment.

item.title: Power The Future
item.description: Game Description Power The Future throws the player under the control of one of 7 nations, including the USA, Germany and China. The game is developing step by step from 2025 to 2038, where the main task is to provide the state’s energy needs. Players achieve this, developing technologies and creating a power grid that extends through national and international territories. This system requires the provision of consumption units located in its own and surrounding territories.

item.title: Ground of Aces
item.description: Game Description Ground of Aces puts you at the head of the remote air base during the Second World War. The player’s main task is to build and establish the work of a functional military facility, having complete freedom in planning each building, from individual walls to large -scale hangars. This airfield serves as a house for aircraft and personnel. You are responsible for the development of infrastructure to support hostilities, directly affecting the operational capabilities of the complex.

item.title: Backyard Baseball '01
item.description: Game Description Backyard Baseball ‘01 is a sports simulator where users manage a baseball team. The central mechanics consists in creating a roster by selecting from 30 young athletes and 28 professional athletes of the MLB of that period. Users can participate in various formats of the game, from a single exhibition match until the full season leading to the championship. The training mode is also available for testing timing, allowing the chosen Batter to meet Mr.

item.title: SCOOTX
item.description: Game Description SCOOTX represents a scooter simulation, where each component is 100 percent controlled by physics. All actions on the screen, from wheels to the head of the rider, determines the central physical engine. Pressing buttons triggers are launched by the animations of the tricks, however, the final movement is calculated by the base system, based on the laws of physics. Any graind, VIP or collision with the surface cause a reaction based on applied strength.

item.title: Don'T Messes with Bober
item.description: Game Description Don’T Messes with Bober begins with a character from the city to the city to a country house for the relaxation period. The arrival of the protagonist is conceived as an escape from the hustle and bustle, but one careless act against the local fauna completely changes the situation. This action awakens a beaver that begins the campaign of revenge against a person. The narrative was created in the spirit of horror films of the 1980s, turning a secluded location into a hostile territory.

item.title: Revengeful Ghost
item.description: Game Description Revengeful Ghost introduces Kayiti Tsujisava, a second grade student of a high school, whose twin sister Akane disappears after a message on his phone-scrap. This communication contained a video that became central in subsequent events. Soon after the loss of Akan, another student from his school takes scores with life, jumping off the roof. This second incident forces Cayiti to go to the educational institution to clarify the connection between these cases.

item.title: Limscape: The Liminal Space Explorer
item.description: Game Description Limscape: The Liminal Space Explorer offers the first -person trip to quiet, terrible environment. In this project, gamers move according to locations that demonstrate signs of linearity, striving for the exit. This gameplay develops from simple movement, including actions such as swimming, jumping, squats and climbing. Such activity translate the study from horizontal routes to vertical obstacles, increasing the player’s immersion and its interaction with unique conditions. Gamers also select and throw objects, further strengthening their influence on the world.

item.title: Longstory 2
item.description: Game Description Longstory 2 continues the established narrative with a large number of dates, developing friendly relations and difficult situations. The action takes place in the summer in front of a high school, immediately after the events of the previous part. During the party, in honor of Marseille’s return, a personality, known as Turkeyhawk, disappears home. This event gives the start of the main riddle, offering the player to find this character.

item.title: Click and Conquer
item.description: Game Description Click and Conquer represents a resource management system through military operations. The main gameplay is based on the discharge of bombs on the grid to detect disguised enemy detachments. Each opened unit brings currency that serves as a central resource for further development. The received funds are distributed to increase passive income and an increase in the destructive force of each ammunition. The cycle of expenses and savings determines the promotion of the player at affordable stages.

item.title: Ranch Farm and Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ranch Farm and Store Simulator sets the player the task of creating and managing a united agricultural and retail enterprise. It all starts with the purchase of livestock, including chickens, goslings and calves that need constructed pens for detention. Animals give products, for example, eggs and milk, and after growing up, they can be launched for sale. Thus, the gamer controls the livestock cycle from young animals to receiving the final product.

item.title: Parcel Simulator
item.description: Game Description Parcel Simulator includes the inspection and processing of parcels in the warehouse. The player will have to receive and sort incoming delivery, checking on each sticker such parts as weight, destination and type of contents. The process consists of entering or scanning barcodes, inspection of departments for smuggling and making a decision on admission or refusal for each box based on constantly changing rules. As Parcel Simulator passes, the main emphasis shifts the automation and expansion of the enterprise.

item.title: BellFortis
item.description: Game Description In BellFortis, the action takes place in the early Middle Ages, where users seek to expand their kingdoms and influence the course of history. Title combines step -by -step strategic planning and real -time battles, which gives you the opportunity to control the army and make decisions that affect the world. Would you like to build a strong empire with the help of diplomacy or strength - the choice is yours.

item.title: Chinese Frontiers
item.description: Game Description Chinese Frontiers is an atmospheric immersion in the time of ancient China, where users will be able to feel the life of a simple resident of the village. The game is a simulator of life where you have to take under the management of the employee, which is working on the construction of a great Chinese wall. Gamers will be able to test various types of crafts of that time, and will also monitor the character indicators, giving him food, water and rest in time.

item.title: Rematch
item.description: Game Description Rematch is a competitive football, where, unlike traditional titles, he offers a unique interpretation of this sport, focusing on quick matches. Gamers control one character with a third person, focusing on individual skill and teamwork. The game is designed in such a way as to constantly keep users in suspense, focusing on speed and accuracy. Here each move matters, and the outcome is determined by how well users coordinate their actions and respond to pressure.

item.title: Rugby League Team Manager 4
item.description: Game Description Rugby League Team Manager 4 puts you at the head of the regional club. The circle of your tasks is covered by financial management, negotiations with sponsors and the selection of the state of assistants, mentors and medical staff. You have to improve infrastructure, including the stadium, gym and training fields. This project covers 226 teams from the Northern and Southern Hems, and over 7,000 adult players are available for choice.

item.title: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
item.description: Game Description Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is an exciting medieval fantasy urban planning strategy that will check your leadership qualities and make you make a difficult choice to ensure the survival and prosperity of your kingdom. In this game, the fate of your people largely depends on the decisions you have taken, and the path you have chosen - favor or tyranny - will determine your heritage. The will is your weapon, you must build and strengthen your city, form the land and develop your kingdom with the help of a deep technological tree.

item.title: Date EVERYTHING!
item.description: Game Description Date EVERYTHING! It begins after the main character loses his job due to artificial intelligence. Following this incident, a stranger delivers a parcel with glasses called DateViators. This accessory revives inanimate things in the dwelling of the protagonist, endowing them with his own character. The project contains a list of 100 potential partners, from bed to fire alarm, each of which is completely voiced. Through dialogues, the player studies the background and motives of these household objects that have now become his companions.

item.title: GIT GUD
item.description: Game Description Git Gud is a head-headed game, the action of which takes place in the command line interface, where players have to overcome difficulties related to versions management. The main gameplay is to analyze verbal descriptions and input the correct, functional Git commands for passing 100 levels. The initial stages are introduced to basic concepts, such as the preparation of the first commune and the use of branches for new functions.

item.title: Three Kingdoms Mushouden
item.description: Game Description Three Kingdoms Mushouden transfers gamers in 182 of our era, on the threshold of the uprising of yellow dressings. The imperial court is covered by a deep internal confusion and fractional straightforwardness, which interferes with the work of officials, condemning the people into difficult trials. Players choose either a unique hero or a commander from the annals; They have to form troops and conclude alliances. Such preparations are carried out against the background of growing chaos, giving the opportunity to change the course of history.

item.title: Cast N Chill
item.description: Game Description Cast N Chill represents a fishing system in a series of various lakes, rivers and oceans. The main goal is to catch the prey from water bodies using a fishing rod, because in each location their types of water inhabitants live. In all fishing expeditions, the player is accompanied by a true dog, which is present at each point. A special catalog monitors the progress of the collection of 50 varieties of fish, including freshwater and marine creatures.

item.title: Scratchers
item.description: Game Description Scratchers is an incidental simulator built on the mechanics of erasing virtual cards to get a currency. The main gameplay is to open the surfaces of maps by Point and Click, directly generating cash. The accumulated wealth serves as the main resource for unlocking the improvement tree and expanding the scale of the operation. As they move, the possibility of hiring automated workers, small assistants who independently perform the central task and ensure the receipt of income without constant intervention open.

item.title: Snow Plowing Simulator
item.description: Game Description Snow Plowing Simulator is a relaxing and atmospheric simulator in which cleaning the territory from snow becomes an exciting adventure! Forget about the difficulties of winter cleaning - here you can enjoy snowy beauty and study the surroundings using various tools and vehicles. Start with a simple shovel, and then advance to more serious machines and interchangeable plows systems to complete more and more complex tasks in all corners of the city and mountainous areas.

item.title: IDLE WATERS
item.description: Game Description IDLE WATERS is a game in the IDLE-Rybank genre that works from the window at the bottom of the screen and is designed to simultaneously work with other computer operations. The game window has flexibility: it can be scale, change the layout, change the size and move to any part of the desktop or completely hide. This system allows the simulator to function without requiring constant attention from the gamer.

item.title: Covenant of Solitude
item.description: Game Description Covenant of Solitude introduces the story of a young man named Fort, who secretly owns the gift to command monsters in a secluded settlement of the leaves. The carriers of such a force are called ginns - their fate is full of persecution, fear and exploitation from others. The familiar way of life of the hero breaks off when the war breaks into his house, flooding the streets with blood and forcing the fort to accept his essence.

item.title: Rise of Industry 2
item.description: Game Description Rise of Industry 2 is a setting in which production magnates form the economy, factories produce goods at a frantic speed, and transactions are concluded according to stationary phones with a rotating dial. Success depends on smart investments, effective production and happiness of the right people. Each solution has weight, whether it is the conclusion of profitable trading transactions or the choice of the industry in which it should be dominated.

item.title: VOID War
item.description: Game Description Void War puts a player at the head of an ancient starship, sending him on a journey to the heart of a dying empire. This ship is described as a powerful and formidable gun filled with secret technologies. The tasks include the reflection of the attacks of crazy cultists, cowardly cosmopirates and xenophobic imperial soldiers. The detection of powerful artifacts allows you to turn a starship into a frightening combat vehicle.

item.title: CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator
item.description: Game Description CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator sends gamers on a trip to the world of Windspell, a port city filled with potential and adventures. Users stand in place of a merchant, ready to create unique items that can change the fate of the city. This game is not just about the trade in goods, it is about how to pave your way through creativity. Whether you create intricate necklaces for royal mermaids or a weapon from the blood of dragons - each item has its own charm.

item.title: Car Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Car Dealer Simulator opens the way to the sphere of trading by former cars. People look for suitable offers, buy vehicles at a low cost, make improvements and then sell them to increase profits. The gameplay reflects the development from basic automobile works to the management of the car dealership. This approach contributes to the formation of your business. In Car Dealer Simulator, gamers master commercial techniques in Little Sam, a hero with features in terms of order.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
item.description: Game Description fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 unfolds the story of desperate efforts. The inexplicable disappearance of Malta forces the group of children to head to the forbidden cave, where they are leaded by a mysterious voice to Taranis - a powerful armored vehicle, which was considered lost. The determination to find Malta returns them aboard this combat vehicle, starting a direct attack on the central regions of the Berman Empire.

item.title: As We Descend
item.description: Game Description AS We Descend combines Roguelike debiting with strategic gameplay. Gamers command forces in card battles against enemies in the post -apocalyptic city. The fate of mankind is determined by the tactical decisions made on the battlefield and in the political structure of the city. The project includes the creation and development of detachments using the found technologies. Each group has a special set of cards that can be expanded and modified.

item.title: TRASH GOBLIN
item.description: Game Description Trash Goblin is an adventure about a store that invites gamers to plunge into the noisy life of a silver city, where every day it opens up new opportunities and sets new tasks. Having risen in place of orphaned goblin, players daily search for treasures hidden in bags of garbage. Each bag is a mixture of potential and disorder filled with trinkets that are waiting for them to be cleaned and repaired.

item.title: Zombie Cure Lab
item.description: Game Description Zombie Cure Lab - this is an opportunity to plunge into a colorful sandbox-laboratory, in which gamers have to put a variety of experiments on zombies. Scientists find a way to begin to control monsters that will be able to turn into hybrid creatures, half-dead people. Now you have to find a full medicine to calm and cure all the injured humanity from the disease of zombie. Users will build walls and fences to protect complexes with scientists.

item.title: Contractville
item.description: Game Description Contraactville beckoning lovers of simulators with their history about how to turn from rags into rich. Forget about gorgeous houses, you start with a penny in a port town. But do not be afraid, starting a tycoon! In Contractville you can build your own fate yourself by demolition, construction and interior design. And what is interesting: you can sell your architectural masterpieces at the auction, turning your sweat and ingenuity into cold, firm money.

item.title: Clink
item.description: Game Description Clink puts a player in the role of a woman living in voluntary solitude in an old house only with her cat and buried memories. The central conflict lies in the question of whether its experiences are symptoms of a prescribed disease or a manifestation of something otherworldly. One morning, the familiar way of the heroine is broken: one of the doors is locked, the key disappeared, and a metal ringing echoed in his head.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Cauldron
item.description: Game Description Cauldron is a role project with an emphasis on a system of improvement and the implementation of mini-stories. In the role of NIX, a character who finds himself in a world immersed in darkness will have to explore the environment and look for allies. The structure implies the cycle: the commission of actions leads to strengthening the party, which opens the way to the study of new areas and obtaining content.

item.title: Roadcraft
item.description: Game Description Roadcraft is a simulator in which gamers take on the role of the head of a company engaged in the restoration of territories affected by natural disasters. The main task is to use various types of construction equipment for clearing blockages, restoring roads and repairing damaged infrastructure. The Title offers a detailed approach to the problems that arise in the elimination of the consequences of natural disasters, offering tasks such as replacing faulty equipment and deploying resources columns to create the necessary materials for reconstruction.

item.title: Blacksmith Master
item.description: Game Description Blacksmith Master is an exciting simulator in which you can control your own blacksmiths, starting with mining and precious stones to the design and sale of finished products. Your task will be tortured everything - from weapons and armor to instruments and kitchen utensils - to earn on your craft and become a real master of blacksmithing. Here you can lead your own medieval blacksmith and you will control the entire process: the extraction of resources, their processing and production and sale of finished products.

item.title: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2 - fishing simulator, offering to participate in a huge number of tests and demonstrate many different techniques. Use a wide set of tools and gear: feeder, overlap, spinning, classic float and much more. Continuation of the game significantly improves the graphic component, adds many mechanics, tools and improves all aspects of the gameplay. More and better - the basic principle of Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2.

item.title: Cash Cleaner Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cash Cleaner Simulator immerses a gamer in the role of a specialist in processing illegal means for criminal structures. The character accepts orders from figures of the criminal world, which need to be returned to finances without traces of their origin. Deliveries come in various packages, demanding to extract currency, determine the presence of contaminants like blood or dirt, as well as weed out false banknotes before the main procedure.

item.title: Chronomon
item.description: Game Description Chronomon combines elements of monsters care and the simulation of the farm. Players find themselves in the world after a disaster, where they have to catch unusual creatures, improve their skills and help in restoration. Communication with the settlers and step -by -step battles complement the process of arranging their own allotment of land, and the main task is to form a detachment of pets and control of resources in the proposed conditions.

item.title: Doloc Town
item.description: Game Description Doloc Town - this is a farm simulator in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The player accepts the role of a beginner whose task is to build an existing economy in the desert territory. The environment pushes to the study of its predominantly unexplored areas. Key activity includes the landing of cultures, the construction of the necessary structures and the consistent search for information about the past of this changed world.

item.title: Tank Squad
item.description: Game Description Tank Squad transfers players during the Second World War, to the most intense territories, whose fate will affect the outcome of the clash. The user will visit the role of captain of the tank detachment, taking part in the iconic battles of that time. Scenarios will include historical battles for a single -user or cooperative passage of three participants at the same time. In the multiplayer, each gamer is able to control their own team, or unite among themselves and become a separate crew member.

item.title: Teddy's Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Teddy’s Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator puts the player in the role of the owner who controls a small store on the periphery of the mysterious island. The shop specializes in the sale of potions, weapons and various magic wonders for a variety of clientele. Among the buyers are adventurers preparing for campaigns, magicians in search of rare components and other mystical creatures. The main cycle of classes is to replenish the shelves, manage the inventory, set up each aspect of the interior and hiring employees.

item.title: Best Served Cold
item.description: Game Description The Best Served Cold puts a gamer at the Knightsp Rack, an underground bar, working during the dry law in the alternative European city of Bukovia. You take on the role of a bartender responsible for the preparation of cocktails for visitors to the institution. Intections go beyond the maintenance, including direct clashes with persons identified as criminals and the need to navigate in dangerous situations. The main actions include the investigation of the murders taking place in this environment while maintaining the work of the bar.

item.title: Knights of the Crusades
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Crusades sends a player during the first crusades, where a lone knight will come to begin. It is ahead to go to the foundation and management of the holy order, choosing the Templars or creating their own fraction. The process combines real -time elements with the construction of settlements and management within the sandbox. You have to solve problems related to war, religious influence, diplomacy and strategic planning.

item.title: Badlands Crew
item.description: Game Description Badlands Crew transfers to the gamer control over a combat vehicle in the world of lawlessness that arose after a global catastrophe. Key tasks include the construction of transport, its modification and use against hostile groups for the search and salvation of the survivors. You collect your mobile fortress from individual components, selecting elements such as flamethrowers, sniper turrets, rate of fire machine guns, observation tower and medical points.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: Hollywood Mogul 4
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Mogul 4 — это текстовый бизнес-симулятор, ставящий человека во главе киностудии. Система позволяет создавать кинофильмы и мини-сериалы на основе библиотеки из более чем 14 000 исходных материалов или собственных идей. Ready -made paintings can be planned for global film distribution or for distribution through streaming service. The process includes the formation of accurate budgets, the conclusion of agreements on rental in 19 foreign territories and the management of advertising expenses.

item.title: Drive Rally
item.description: Game Description Drive Rally is an arcade game about rally races that transfers gamers during the glory of the 1990s. Having focused on speeds, skill and exciting sensations of an open road, Advencura offers nostalgic experience for fans of classic rally races. Users take on the role of a rally racer, competing in various iconic places around the world. From the dusty deserts of Africa to the snowy peaks of Scandinavia - each area offers unique trials and opportunities.

item.title: Synergy
item.description: Game Description synergy dedicated to survival on a hostile planet. In this urban planning strategy, players have to develop their city, face natural cataclysms and make the right decisions that will certainly have consequences. Explore this constantly changing world, preserving the happiness of the townspeople in extreme weather conditions. Gamers will control the weather, seasons, extreme conditions and natural disasters. The main goal is to build a city where residents will be happy and satisfied, respecting the natural needs of the inhabitants and living in harmony with the local fauna and flora.

item.title: Forever skies
item.description: Game Description Forever skies is an atypical survival in the world of post -apocalypse, where the player will become the captain of the airship. Unfortunately, the protagonist is the only crew member, but even this does not reduce the number of his problems. After all, he still needs food, which is practically no in the air with the exception of rare birds. And the technique tends to break, and it requires constantly replacing old details.

item.title: Lushfoil Photography Sim
item.description: Game Description Lushfoil Photography SIM is an incredibly beautiful and relaxing game in which the player can simply relax as much as he needs. She does not drive the user forward, allowing him to admire the views, relaxes the natural sounds of the noise of leaves, water or the creak of snow. If desired, you can completely turn off the musical accompaniment and plunges into the virtual world, so similar to the real one.

item.title: Hollywood Animal
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Animal is not an ordinary strategic game. Forget about the conquest of empires or the construction of huge cities. Here you are in the roaring twenties - the time when the silent movie gave way to the “talkers”, and the film studios tried to keep up. You are in the director’s chair, but not for the camera. This time you are a studio boss, solving all issues, starting from who will play in the film, and ending when the last blockbuster is released.

item.title: Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days
item.description: Game Description Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days transfer the player to Walton City, Texas, 1980 sample, covered by a zombie epidemic. The gamer has to lead a detachment of surviving through the dying metropolis. The key task of the gameplay is to move the wards between temporary shelters, taking care of their condition. It is necessary to find provisions, make objects and repulse constant danger from the dead who filled the streets.

item.title: Promise Mascot Agency
item.description: Game Description Promise Mascot Agency offers the gamer to plunge into the life of Kaso-Machi, a damned Japanese town. The main character, Michi, is in exile and must establish the work of the agency of urban masks. Key tasks include hiring these creatures, resolving the problems that arise due to their actions, and clarifying the causes of the protagonist link. Communication with a kick, a living finger with a complex character, is also part of the gameplay while you are trying to make your agency the best in the region through the study of the world and plot events.

item.title: Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers
item.description: Game Description Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers calls the gamarines into a world filled with more than 180 creatures who need to collect, fight and develop. The Title combines the elements of autoboeviks, rogeliks and card battles, allowing users to develop unique strategies. The purpose of the game is to assemble the KDOMON team, each of which has various abilities and types in order to pass more and more difficult tests. As you pass, you will encounter powerful bosses and open rare monsters with special abilities.

item.title: Voiceatc Simulator
item.description: Game Description Voiceatc Simulator is a simulator that puts a player in the role of an air traffic controller, where voice communication serves as a main tool for managing aircraft. The main gameplay is to build arriving sides for landing and their maintenance on strips created on the basis of real airfield schemes. You give oral teams for vectoring, changing the echelon, adjusting speed and execution of transitions, effectively controlling the sky.

item.title: Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder
item.description: Game Description Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder can be attributed to the simulators of the colony and real -time strategies. There are also survival elements in the indie project. He has high reigree due to the random generation of cards. The gamer here is offered to establish a settlement and help it develop to a full -fledged city. At the same time, it is necessary to monitor the needs and mood of the townspeople.

item.title: Pocket City 2
item.description: Game Description Pocket City 2 makes it possible for players to build cities, and then study their first -person creations. The process starts from the laying of roads, the markings of sections for residential, commercial or industrial needs and the construction of the necessary objects on the map. Control over the economy implies monitoring of stocks, profit and a thoughtful placement of special structures, access to which opens as they move.

item.title: inzoi
item.description: Game Description Inzoi is a life -symbol game in which gamers assign the role of the creator and observer in a detailed virtual community. In a dynamic environment, users can interact with various characters known as Zoe. These characters are not connected by actions recorded in the script, but act of their own free will, controlled by more than 400 mental elements that form their behavior and solutions. Result? A constantly developing world in which rumors spread, trends and even diseases appear.

item.title: A Merchant's Promise
item.description: Game Description A Merchant’s Promise Places the player in the stylized Middle Ages, concentrated on commerce and transportation through direct physical handling of objects. The path begins with the role of a worthless merchant, who is instructed to manually move goods using a system based on physics. There is no usual inventory here; Each object needs to be raised, carried and placed, which creates a constant risk of dropping or even throwing a luggage.

item.title: Kaiserpunk
item.description: Game Description Kaiserpunk throws you headlong into an alternative XX century, instructing to build an empire from scratch. This is not Grandfather’s Urban planner - Title offers a grandiose strategy, demanding from you to win a vast card, while preserving the residents happy, and the factory - working. Does it sound like a high task? This is true. Forget that you can just put at home and finish it on this.

item.title: Urban Jungle
item.description: Game Description Urban Jungle gives users the opportunity to turn ordinary residential premises into bright vegetable sanctuaries, without straining in a gameplay. The project invites enthusiasts to experiment with the placement of plants in compact apartments, creating personal green corners without typical care worries that accompany gardening in the real world. Users use the main mechanics of strategic decoration, determining the optimal position for each plant variety in order to maximize the level of comfort in digital living space.

item.title: Call of Boba
item.description: Game Description Call of Boba transfers to a small, bizarre town, where they find themselves in the role of assistants, helping to revive the destructive Bob tea store. At first, the task is simple: to cook delicious drinks, attract customers and develop business. But underground is hiding something more. With the onset of night, a completely new world opens, and this is where real adventures begin. Armed with the ingredients for Bob milk tea, users fight enemies to get inspiration for the creations of the store.

item.title: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a survival simulator that immerses in the very heart of the ancient forest. Title takes users to a world where nature is not only living, but also has its own mind. Here, gamers build a house, overcome daily difficulties and interact with a rich ecosystem full of wild animals, magical creatures and unpredictable forces. Every day brings new difficulties associated with survival: from hunger and health management to solving problems with the weather and seasons.

item.title: FACEMINER
item.description: Game Description FaceMiner offers a deep immersion in the world of collecting biometric data. Here gamers fall into the chaotic world before the beginning of the new millennium, where the main task is to collect and classifying data on faces on a mass scale. As a user, you start small, gradually building an empire from biometric data. On this path, you have to expand the scale: to update software, develop infrastructure and maximize profits, overcoming the sea of ​​corporate problems.

item.title: Dead Dragons
item.description: Game Description Dead Dragons launches history 100 years after the victory of people over the dragons - the events that allegedly brought the world. Now rumors about the return of these creatures encourage the protagonist to investigate the case of a mysterious girl associated with the dragon race. This task develops into a conflict that decides the fate of the whole world and raises the main question of the survival of one of the species in the upcoming confrontation.

item.title: Mind Over Magic
item.description: Game Description The Mind Over Magic offers the player to become the master of the magic school located over a dangerous underground maze. You have to design, build and manage all aspects of your school, from classes to dormitories, from gardens to laboratories. You also have to train your students with various magical skills, such as lost lasso, production of potions, growing plants and necromancy. But your school is not a safe refuge.

item.title: Arctic Motel Simulator
item.description: Game Description In the Arctic Motel Simulator, the action takes place in a remote and vast Arctic region. Here gamers will take the work of turning the struggling motel into a prosperous business in harsh arctic conditions. Users will encounter unpredictable Arctic weather, controlling everyone from temperature in the rooms in winter to humidity in the summer. At your disposal, eight different types of numbers, and gamers will be able to choose the one that corresponds to their business centers and budget.

item.title: Astronomics
item.description: Game Description In Astronomics, gamers are sent to study the space and the production of asteroids. You have to move through randomly generated asteroids, extract resources and manage a developing enterprise. At first, the whole thing is assembling materials on asteroids flying past, but as it moves forward, automation becomes a key factor. With workers and command bots, at your disposal, the tasks for which the clock used to go, can be completed much faster.

item.title: Keep Driving
item.description: Game Description Keep Driving immerses in the atmosphere of freedom of a long, slow trip to the procedurally generated world. The action takes place in the early 2000s, you are behind the wheel of your first car, a long road and a festival are ahead, which you need to get to the other end of the country. Passing along the highway and dirt roads, you are faced with difficulties, both from the environment and from the bizarre hitchhiker, looking for a passage.

item.title: Blood Bar Tycoon
item.description: Game Description In Blood Bar Tycoon, users are in the place of the manager of the Vampire Bar. The goal is to create and manage a series of blood bars so that people and vampire customers are satisfied. Along the way, gamers build blood factories, collect blood and encounter problems such as hunters and vampire-competing. Due to the possibility of micro -study or assignment automation, users can accurately configure the work to develop their dark empire.

item.title: Foundation
item.description: Game Description The urban planning simulator-Foundation-will allow you to plunge in the medieval era, build a whole settlement, make people happy at the expense of unique structures, as well as understand the history of the construction of houses and churches, on which there was a lot of emphasis due to constant rivalry of religious directions. We will build houses and other structures with smart brushes. They will allow us not to exceed authority and put only those buildings that will meet environmental norms and criteria.

item.title: Heart of the Machine
item.description: Game Description Heart of the Machine outwardly resembles a town -planning Taikun. But in fact, the project is something like a god of God with elements of tactics and strategy in real time. Only here the Juzer is assigned the role of not a divine being, which owns magic, but artificial intelligence. This video game has a science fiction setting. Its action takes place in a distant and gloomy future in the territory of the metropolis-colonies.

item.title: Libritopia: Librarian Simulator
item.description: Game Description Libritopia: Librarian Simulator gives you the management of its own library institution. The main tasks include acceptance and sorting of literary works from all over the world. It is necessary to form collects of the works of Shakespeare and Jules Verne, placing them on racks for free access. This game makes it possible to create a personal classification system that allows you to catalog literature on the genre, author, country or any other method.

item.title: Space Engineers 2
item.description: Game Description Space Engineers 2 returns to the world of space development with updated experience. In this continuation, you will have a new adventure in the Almagest system, where engineering tasks and spaces of space are combined in the most unexpected way. This is a sandbox with an open world in which you can build from scratch - or, rather, from stars - from starships to entire space stations. The goal is simple: to raise your creative potential to a new height, while managing the difficulties of survival in the cold, inexorable spaces of space.

item.title: Learning Factory
item.description: Game Description learning factory - a simulator that is designed to create an automated process of processes and, most importantly, understand one simple truth: what do cats want? The gameplay allows you to head the Kotovod factory. It was once closed, but now it has been possible to renew the process and create your own cat store. Learning factory gameplay largely gives an idea of ​​how machine learning works. Your factory is analyzing a huge database, trying to study the behavior of pets.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Diddy
item.description: Game Description Diddy begins with a mission to destroy a dark party held in a private estate. Players in the Company of Eminam and 51 Centers must stop the owner’s atrocities and stop the meeting. The main task is the salvation of Justin B, who is in the territory after the accumulation of a state fraud. The detachment confronts the army of Selebri, acting as a guards, ready to defend the estate and its owner.

item.title: Harvest Hills
item.description: Game Description Harvest Hills immerses the player in plant cultivation and animal care in order to obtain agricultural products. The initial actions allow you to create products such as eggs, milk, honey and wool. The sale of these products in the local market provides income to modernize the economy and introduce automation systems. According to the plot, the protagonist leaves the city bustle for the founding of an agrarian enterprise, gradually turning the empty plot of land into a flourishing ranch.

item.title: Anime City
item.description: Game Description Anime City transfers gamers to a bright 3D virtual Tokyo, inspired by anime culture. Title combines the mechanics of the visual novel and sandbox, creating an interactive environment, focused on everyday life, social interactions and school experience. Users stand in the place of a high school student, moving along a dynamic, fictitious city landscape, interacting with the characters, exploring key places and participating in various events. Title offers many ways to plunge into this detailed city - from clubs after lessons to public events and part -time work.

item.title: Defensurvivor
item.description: Game Description Defensurvivor puts a player at the head of the protection of asylum in the world captured by zombies. The main goal is to hold out for 15 minutes against the continuous waves of attackers, managing defense and staff. Gamers erect and modernize the walls through the construction menu, creating barriers to the direction of movement of the approaching horde. Success requires adaptation to the fighters accidentally issued for each session.

item.title: Laundry Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Laundry Store Simulator - a game in which you start small and advance up the career ladder. You will update the equipment, arrange a stylish store and expand the range of services. Is your goal in the laundry store simulator? Become the owner of the best institution in the world. Turn a small laundry into a flourishing business imperial! Update the equipment, arrange and expand the store, hire staff and much more!

item.title: Retrowave 2
item.description: Game Description Retrowave 2 places a player under the control of the supercar of the 1980s, moving along an endless highway surrounded by neon lights and palm trees. The project draws inspiration in an idealized, futuristic interpretation of that era, causing a sense of nostalgia for a period that never existed. This atmosphere provides a complete immersion in the world of Syntveyva. The main lesson is the piloting of transport along the road system on a retro -futuristic background, where aesthetics are built around synthesizer music.

item.title: Space Architect
item.description: Game Description Space Architect is a simulator where gamers have to become in place of the manager of the space station. The main goal is to build, maintain and expand the space station, simultaneously coping with the difficulties of resource management and interstellar trade. In the beginning, users are faced with a serious financial burden - a huge debt to a powerful megarporace, which forces them to make complex decisions on how to get income and stay afloat in endless cosmic voids.

item.title: Luma Island
item.description: Game Description Luma Island sends users on a trip full of research, discoveries and tests. Regardless of whether you go alone or unite with friends, this adventure is a world full of possibilities. The island offers a wide range of classes - from the construction of the farm of his dreams to the discovery of hidden treasures and solving confusing puzzles. This is a game in which you can plunge into a bright world, constantly discovering something new for yourself and moving forward at your own pace.

item.title: Industry Giant 4.0
item.description: Game Description Industry Giant 4.0 immerses gamers in the landscape determined by industrial management and strategy. Since the 1950s, users are moving through the fourth industrial revolution, where digitalization and interconnected chains of creating cost play the most important role. The goal is to create and manage the industrial empire. This includes not only the production of goods, but also the creation of complex transport networks and monitoring financial transactions.

item.title: Zephon
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Zephon have to take control of the remnants of mankind in order to survive on the territory of the Earth. On the planet, there are few areas that are not suitable for life, and most of the cities were destroyed. In wild territories are mutating creatures that they gather in small groups and begin to hunt for surviving people. Alien robots with damaged systems roam on the surface, and the aliens themselves are hidden and try to secure survival.

item.title: Elin
item.description: Game Description Elin is a two -dimensional role morned in which you can completely immerse yourself in an exciting world, where each solution matters. Choose your hero and go on a dangerous trip to Ylva’s lands, exploring mysterious places, meeting unique characters and fighting various dangers. You will find unforgettable adventures, where you will create your own story, influence the world and leave your mark on Ylva Earth. You have to fight for survival, find and create resources, build houses and manage your city.

item.title: Widget Inc.
item.description: Game Description Widget Inc. - This is a hybrid of the designer of factories and an incremental clicker, who invites users to the kingdom of crafts and production. Starting with basic resources, people go on a trip to master various craft processes. Target? Build a huge factory capable of producing advanced technologies, known as widgets. These widgets serve as a key element of the revival of civilization after the apocalypse. Users perform many tasks, each of which helps to build an empire extending to the stars.

item.title: Orebound
item.description: Game Description Orebound invites users to a world where they take on the role of a gnome, which goes in search of an ancient artifact, known as amber stone. The Title puts the participants in a huge, station environment, where the study and collection of resources form the basis of experience. Users begin with the construction of their base, laying the foundation of their gnome civilization. This journey begins with mineral extraction, where every wave of picks allows you to detect valuable resources.
