The player controls the team of surviving crew members of the space ship. He needs to take care of his wards, providing them with warmth, light, food, medicines, weapons, entertainment.

item.title: Total Conflict: Resistance
item.description: Game Description Total Conflict: Resistance is an incredible mixture of global strategy, tactics and an action in the first person that provides incredible battles, many types of armored vehicles, weapons and armor, as well as unique mechanics to immerse you in exciting gameplay. You have to take part in events, manage units, create your army and produce or purchase armored vehicles and weapons. You can also build fortifications, outposts and settlements, manage military operations in the first person, as well as in tactical mode.

item.title: Swirl Watch
item.description: Game Description Swirl Watch is a stealth scene of a horn, unfolding on a gas giant undergoing excessive operation. Players have to penetrate industrial complexes, bypass or neutralize protection vessels, committing corporate sabotage to create a resistance movement. In the dense atmosphere of the planet Cloud 2, ships find each other only in laser light, noise of engines and echolocation. This situation creates specific conditions for bypassing patrols and dismantling cloud processing stations.

item.title: Pinball FX
item.description: Game Description Pinball FX is not a dusty arcade machine of your father. This digital pinball takes a classic game and injects steroids into it. Forget about awkward management and faded decorations - the title offers a bright collection of tables, each of which has its own unique quirks and goals. Fight the aliens on Mars, worry Christmas with Charlie Brown or save the world along with cult films. Diversity does not allow to get bored, offering something for every user.

item.title: Nucleares
item.description: Game Description Nucleares may be of interest to lovers of original projects and unusual indie-symptures. This is a simulator of an employee of a nuclear power plant with a first -person view. The character has arms, legs and torso. They can be seen if you lower the camera. The hero turns out to be the only employee at an experimental nuclear power plant for which large staff does not need. This object requires only one person, because artificial intelligence is responsible for everything else.

item.title: Contraband Police
item.description: Game Description Contraband Police - The simulator of the border guard in the first person. The player in the role of the commander of the border post makes an inspection of transport for the presence of smuggling on the border of the third world countries. The inspection tasks include: checking documents: inspection and permit for entry criminals … or take a bribe. What? Nobody heard this! To carry out reports on the successful completion of tasks through the mail; the accumulated experience can be spent on pumping the department, buying new equipment or training dogs;

item.title: Research Story
item.description: Game Description Research Story offers to go on a fascinating journey through a mysterious area and help Violet Archive with a recording of exotic plants and creatures. This is a colorful farm simulator that you definitely should try! It is necessary to explore the chimerbruck and its environs, find and write down a variety of plants and creatures, as well as breed your unique garden and take care of pets. In addition, you will have to establish relations with local residents and fulfill various quests.

item.title: X-Plane 12
item.description: Game Description X -Plane 12 is a realistic air system that allows you to fly around the world on a variety of aircraft. Each type of transport is represented by unique characteristics and individual control panels. Professional pilots took part in the development of X-Plane 12, which allows gameplay to transfer real experience from air management. Airplanes, helicopters, gliders, etc. are available for flights. The elaboration of not only aircraft is released, but also the environment.

item.title: KYNSEED
item.description: Game Description KYNSEED is a role -playing game in an adventure genre and a life simulator in an open world. The game saw the light in 2018 and has already managed to find its own fan base. The essence of the passage is to completely immerse into the invented world, filled with various inhabitants, who have their own affairs and habits. The player is invited to interact with these characters, simultaneously equipping his own life.

item.title: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers
item.description: Game Description Police Simulator: Patrol Officers is a policeman simulator, offering to plunge on weekdays of this difficult profession. Players put on the cap of the cop to go to patrol the streets of Brighton. It is necessary to start the path with the simplest tasks. For example, write a fine for parking, etc. Later, new missions will open, in which it will be necessary to take part in the chases of the monitoring of criminals.

item.title: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
item.description: Game Description Winter Falling: Battle Tactics invites gamers to lead the troops and lead them to victory in the most stressful and tactical battles. And only your mind can save the dying world from devastation. You control a detachment of mercenaries, collect supplies and troops, perform tasks and even you can burn villages if you decide that you need it. But do not forget that all your actions have consequences.

item.title: Out of Ore
item.description: Game Description In Out of Ore, gamers have to take many heavy equipment under their control, with the help of which it will be possible to extract ore, move the ground, dig pits, build or repair buildings and much more. It is necessary to test yourself as a driver of construction equipment, which is intended for various purposes. The main character goes on the plot for the very north of the country where there is a small base from Company Mining Corp.

item.title: Victoria 3
item.description: Game Description Victoria 3 is a direct sequel to the game of the same name, where the gamer will act in a time period from 1836 to 1936. In the manager’s simulator, Juzer is invited to choose one of the available countries, and manage it for the specified time. It will have to be controlled by political, demographic, economic processes, as well as try to pacify the layers of the population in order to build an ideal society.

item.title: Mars Base
item.description: Game Description Mars Base will appreciate all fans of science fiction, as Gamer goes to the world of the future, in which travels between planets became possible. Humanity makes a desperate attempt to colonize Mars, but the first settlers will be in a serious danger. The protagonist is one of those who fell into the very first expedition and is obliged to build a huge complex on the surface of the Red Planet, which will make a person’s life away from the ground.

item.title: PC Building Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description PC Building Simulator 2 - a simulator for assembling a personal computer, in which players need to take on the role of a businessman engaged in PC sales. A full -fledged career regime is available. You will need to learn how to work with customers by accepting their orders. Players need to both repair computers and collect them from scratch. It is important to constantly increase profits to pay for rent and buy new components or tools.

item.title: Virtual Sailor NG
item.description: Game Description Virtual Sailor NG is a simulator with the open world, concentrated on the management of water vessels. The physical system of the project reproduces marine dynamics and behavior of various boats on the water. This allows gamers to direct vessels anywhere within the environment, which opens up scope for research. Players master all forms of sailing, using the first -person species and 6 degrees of freedom. Both single and multiplayer regime are available.

item.title: WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs]
item.description: Game Description WTC: Relentless Protagonist [sxs] - this is a visual short story with two -dimensional graphics. She imitates anime drawing. The atmosphere combines drama, comedy and thriller. There are scenes with violence in the game. Title includes 102 scenes, and his script consists of 73,000 words. The plot has 3 endings and 2 epilogue. The video game is designed for about 6-8 hours of passage. The gameplay traditionally for the genre consists of considering pictures, reading the text and periodic decision -making.

item.title: Terra Invicta
item.description: Game Description Terra Invicta is a cosmic 4x strategy, the events of which develop in the distant future. Once, alien forces invaded our galaxy, dividing humanity into 7 factions. Each union saw its development of the future. You have to lead one of the seven ideologies to impose it to the whole world. Explore the solar system, expand the territories and fight enemies in tactical fights. The aliens invaded the far corner of the Kuiper ice belt.

item.title: After the Collapse
item.description: Game Description AFTER The COLLAPSE is a 2D strategy, a management and management simulator of its own settlement. A camera that is above above the surface at right angles is used. The surrounding world survived the apocalypse, which is why it turned into radioactive wastelands and became very dangerous for living people without means of protection against monsters and aggressive bandits. The task of the gamer is to develop existing buildings and build new ones to increase population growth and create a powerful army that is ready to fight off external threats.

item.title: Way of the Hunter
item.description: Game Description Way of the Hunter gives an excellent opportunity to become the owner of his own hunting house in the middle of a deaf forest and periodically go hunting in search of extreme and valuable production. This simulator offers a very realistic experience, as it takes into account many factors and allows you to plunge into a huge completely open virtual world, which looks like alive. It exists regardless of the action of the user - the weather, the time of day changes dynamically, and all the animals sleep, eat, move in search of a safer place.

item.title: Farthest Frontier
item.description: Game Description Farthest Frontier is a strategic game with the simulator elements. The game is made by all canons of 4x-mechanics. You have to develop your settlement and defend it from an attack by the enemy. Guide your people and try not only to survive, but also to develop. The world of wildlife is fraught with many dangers with which you have to face face every day. Collect resources, go hunting, do fishing or farming - do everything possible to survive in harsh and wild conditions.

item.title: Starship Troopers - Terran Command
item.description: Game Description Starship Troopers - Terran Command is a real -time strategy developed based on the Feature Film Star landing. Engage in the construction of the base, get resources and create an army to fight with giant insects living on a foreign planet. You need to colonize the hostile planet, which was suitable for the human race, but a huge number of hostile alien creatures live on its surface. Take the role of the leader of the Terran army.

item.title: Frozenheim
item.description: Game Description Frozenheim - a saga about the Vikings, in which the main character is expelled from his native lands, since blood feud tears his last name. He goes in search of a new home for himself and his loyal subjects. The harsh winter is approaching, and the clan needs to get to the shelter as quickly as possible. The construction of the settlement is a prolonged matter and the central character does not fit.

item.title: Flight of Nova
item.description: Game Description Flight of Nova is a simulator that allows you to sit in a cosmic shuttle cabin and explore a galaxy called Nova. Make interstellar flights and examine the continents using cosmoshattl. Management is completely focused on physics and aerodynamics. Feel the weight and bulkiness of transport, and also experience a feeling of piloting with a bulky car in zero gravity. Explore the surroundings near the NVA-31 planet. Train to manage the ship, choosing one of several available cargo shutters.

item.title: Keplerth
item.description: Game Description The events of the futuristic Indo-video trigger Keplerth unfold in the distant future-on the previously unknown planet Kepler. According to the genre, the project can be attributed to the simulator of survival with the possibility of construction and RPG elements. According to the plot, people built a large spaceship, which was supposed to transport the colonists on board to the nearest planet suitable for life. But there is a disaster, as a result of which the ship crashes on an unknown planet.

item.title: Venture Towns
item.description: Game Description Venture Towns allows players to build a city landscape. This project transfers to the gamers the corporation forming a settlement. From the initial structures to vast skyscrapers, the player leads the development, striving for economic superiority. The game emphasizes the deliberate arrangement of various architectural elements, contributing to a systematic approach to urbanistic growth and current economic activity. In Venture Towns, the processes of the construction of objects open the ways for development.

item.title: Old World
item.description: Game Description Old World in the past was also known as 10 Crowns. The game is a step -by -step global strategy in the antique setting. The gameplay is strikingly different from the games of this genre: it is allowed to give several orders to Unit in one move. Such a resource as “orders” is responsible for additional moves. The more recognition points, the more moves can be made. The resource “Order” can be used in different ways: in battle, in construction, in events or diplomacy.

item.title: Idle Calibur
item.description: Game Description Idle Calibur combines a study of the open world with tactical RPG tactical and real -time mechanics in real time. The gameplay is focused on the construction of a city, which serves to recruit heroes with special abilities. Battles can be automatically due to IDLE function, or you can take direct manual control of your detachments during the fight. Key tasks include the collection of forces to attack other settlements on the world map and participate in structured tests with bosses for development.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses in the adventures taking place in the fabulous kingdom. A group of gods observes the plan of human material being, while mortals compete for power over territories and new lands. The main character is a counter that is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other residents of the planet. It will be possible to manage the whole colonies of settlers to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: Breakwaters
item.description: Game Description In Breakwaters, the player will reconnolate the procedurally generated world with monstrous ocean depths and huge titans that change the method of interaction with water. Water is replaced by powerful crystals obtained in the mine. The user is able to delve into its bowels to collect rare objects, build obstacles to restrain the ocean or block waves, and help people after destruction. Titans, creatures of an extinct submarine race, wander around the world, causing cataclysms.

item.title: Icarus
item.description: Game Description Icarus is a first -person survival that will send you to explore the secrets of one distant planet. You wake up from cryosn after your shuttle made a forced landing on the surface of a mysterious planet. Now you need to stay alive, surviving in unusual conditions. Collect resources, craft items and play both alone and along with other players. The gameplay Ikarus can be described as cooperative action with survival elements.

item.title: Dysmantle
item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Gas Station Simulator
item.description: Game Description GAS Station Simulator - simulator of owning its own refueling, combined with the raising station for road transport, which is located in deserted areas, near the number 66, which is in the United States of America. There is an opportunity to control the gameplay using a gamepad. The player will have to refuel with all the affairs with the help of a virtual protege with a first -person view.

item.title: City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV
item.description: Game Description City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV is a strategic simulator in which it is important not only to chase the demand of players, but also be able to reduce expenses and vice versa, be able to spend money where they are actually needed. Games developers presented a simulator in which you will have to develop a company that develops games. A small studio creating video games decided to expand, so you must make every effort to create a whole headquarters of developers who can satisfy the needs of modern gamers.

item.title: The Doors of Trithius
item.description: Game Description The Doors of Trithius is a RPG -Rogalik in the fantasy world with procedurally generated content. Here you have to fight monsters, avoid traps, collect prey and much more, traveling along the mysterious world of Enalia. Every time you start the game, you have to explore the new generated city, dungeon and map of the world. Movement and battle use a unique time system, returning the priority of the player based on the speed of weapons or action, maintaining tactical decisions, as well as knowledge about your enemies.

item.title: My Garage
item.description: Game Description My Garage is a simulator simulator with a first -person view. In it you can not only repair cars, but also ride them. During travel by transport, you can switch the camera angle. In Indo Tailet, weather conditions are changing. The change of day and night is also available. When driving in the dark, you can turn on the headlights. My Garage has an open world. It consists of mountains, forests, a field, rivers and attractions, like a lighthouse.

item.title: Wrestling Empire
item.description: Game Description In Wrestling Empire the player becomes a participant in the World Lightweight Championship. It is necessary to manage an athlete in the ring, apply his abilities and win rivals. The battles are presented in real time with extensive visual effects. This part includes a smooth frequency of personnel and modern graphics, while leaving the atmosphere of retro-style. This version has more functions and capabilities in pumping and battles. The user will face unique opponents with the original characteristic and special skills.

item.title: Going Medieval
item.description: Game Description Going Medieval is a simulator in which you need to build a fortress on the ruins of an old castle and equip it to protect your settlement. Any event can affect the mood of your people, so you need to satisfy all their needs and be a good king. Events unfold in the era of the dark Middle Ages of the late XIV century. Only five percent of the population survived after a heavy plague epidemic.

item.title: Snowrunner
item.description: Game Description The main difference between Snowrunner and many other cargo simulators is that there are no even roads, highways and autobahns. Only snow, dirt and insurmountable obstacles. The game meets with interesting and diverse tasks, vast cards and, most importantly, a wide choice of transport: SUVs, tractors, all -terrain vehicles and trucks. After choosing a cargo and a car, you should go on a road that is not going to be easy.

item.title: Mr. Prepper
item.description: Game Description Mr. Prepper is a construction simulator where you have to build a bunker under a residential building. Mr. The survivor of those who believe in the theory of conspiracies and understands that a serious threat of nuclear war hung over the world. He does not care about his neighbors and those who do not believe him, so he alone begins to build his own bomb shelter. The nuclear war is close and you must be ready!

item.title: FireWorks Mania - An Explosive Simulator
item.description: Game Description FireWorks Mania - an Explosive Simulator - a simulator in which you need to deal with fireworks. Explore firecrackers, run various signal missiles into the air, etc. Your task is to arrange a real fire show. However, nothing prevents you from just blowing things up and enjoy the gameplay. The gameplay was developed with the aim of entertaining players or to please creative people who know how to think non-standard and create truly amazing fireworks.

item.title: Easy Red 2
item.description: Game Description Easy Red 2 is a first -person shooter with elements of a strategy that immerses in an authentic atmosphere of World War II. The gameplay can plunge into tense and cruel battles, where the main thing is planning and tactics. The gameplay relies on realism. Take a break through the tanks and the enemy’s huge army. Do not fall into the explosion zone and look for ways to survive on the battlefield with your partners.

item.title: Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp
item.description: Game Description Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp is a multi -user dite simulator, the actions of which take place in the monsters camp. The game is replete with charismatic characters and black humor. The events of the game are transferred to the summer camp, where teenagers rest before the start of the new school year. Among the characters, both old heroes and many new ones are represented: Damien, Calcelter, Milo, Dalia, Joy and Arab.

item.title: Empyrion - Galactic Survival
item.description: Game Description Empyrion - Galactic Survival shows the world of the future. In the 24th century, in the ice of Antarctica, they find a spacecraft of aliens. Scientists investigated the object and discovered the technology of the hyperdrod. Earthlings send an expedition to the planet Empirion, which is in the Andromeda nebula. The crew gets to the destination, but tolerates the crash and cannot return home. In survival mode, the player leaves the rescue capsule and is alone against the hostile world.

item.title: Travellers Rest
item.description: Game Description Travellers Rest gives the opportunity to live the life of an innkeeper. You own a small tavern that you dream to turn into a noisy and crowded place in the district. But to achieve this goal, you need to work a lot. Build a bro -up and cook the most delicious beer. Manage the farm and serve only the best products on the table. Satisfy customer requests and gain popularity so that a whole kingdom speaks of your institution!

item.title: Ostriv
item.description: Game Description OSTRIV, this is a city -building simulator that makes you the ruler of the monarch of the 18th century. The player will have to work hard and show his ability to the manager, as well as creative abilities. The goal of the game to transfer the gameplay of simulators of this kind to a new level, by means of adding a huge number of opportunities and abandoning the usual restrictions.

item.title: Panzer Corps 2
item.description: Game Description Plunge into a new type of step -by -step strategies in Panzer Corps 2. The game tells about terrible events during the Second World War. You have to play a key role, taking a large army under command. This is easy to master the gameplay, and the outcome of the battles will depend only on the correct moves, not the reaction. Players can take control of any European country and create their own army of thousands of various units.

item.title: The Sapling
item.description: Game Description The Sapling is a simulator in which you will be selected by growing new plant species or crossing animals. Build your own world inhabited by unusual animals and a phantasmagoric fauna. The Sapling allows you to choose a random mutation mode to be a third -party observer, providing nature to conduct evolution itself and create its own ecosystems. At any time, you can take the development of the environment into your own hands.

item.title: Ai War 2
item.description: Game Description In AI WAR 2, an even more advanced version of AI captured the entire galaxy, and left only a tiny planet to the player. It’s time to strike and outwit the enemy. This will come in handy new capabilities, large flotillas and hacking skills. Or you can get involved in a much more confusing galactic struggle. On the agenda - macrophages, Dyson spheres, nanocosts and much more. Each faction has its own goal, its own rules, units and a completely unique economy.

item.title: Green Hell
item.description: Game Description The survival simulator, which has been waiting for the real depletion of the hero in the conditions of wild jungle for a long time! The protagonist will visit the dark forests of the Amazon with only a radio from the objects of “his time”, and his hands and head will go to help him, which will begin to betray over time. Green Hell - survival, exhaustion, mentally undermined health of the main character.

item.title: Steel Division 2
item.description: Game Description Steel Division 2 is a real -time strategy, during which you will visit the role of Army General during the Bagration Operation. The plot was established during the Second World War on the Eastern Front, and there are thousands of fighters under your command. Thanks to an extensive list of opportunities, the gameplay can take you tens of hours. Pass the plot missions or participate in free mode in a multi -user or single game.

item.title: Spaceengine
item.description: Game Description Spaceengine is a space simulator that makes a photorealistic open space at your disposal that simulates the universe. The SpaceenGine gameplay can be described as an interactive planetarium with procedural generation. Study the long -range corners of the cosmos, visit the planets and fly on a hypercost shuttle. The simulator modifies the spaces of space on a scale of 1: 1. Everything is available in the game: billions of galaxies, foggy, stars and planets - go anywhere and examine any part of the universe.

item.title: Wrench
item.description: Game Description Wrench is an auto mechanic simulator with an emphasis on realism. The task of this game is to clarify the breakdown of the car and the subsequent elimination of problems. Most cars will arrive from racing tracks, so some problems will make your head break. Your career growth begins with the position of a younger assistant who is engaged in the replacement of car liquids and tires. As you pass, the game will teach you professional skills, allowing you to move along the career ladder and move to your goal.

item.title: X4: Foundations
item.description: Game Description In X4: Foundations you can create any spaceship, and then sit down for its helm and start to smash the enemies right and left. The first -person shooter with RPG and sandboxes combines several temporary eras enclosed in a couple of hours of game, but it is impossible to enjoy the gameplay of this project even in a week. You can construct ships of different sizes and goals. It can be small scouts and large ships, wearing several hundred combat birds on their huge backs.

item.title: The Colonists
item.description: Game Description The Colonists are a urban planning sandbox in which you control a team of robots that create themselves. In the game you do not have to fight or kill enemies. The plot side of the project is meditative. You are landing on the planet, begin to carry out non -difficult tasks in which you need to build a settlement, and then improve your town depending on the preferences. Also in the game there is a “free mode” - here you make an island yourself, plant robots, begin to build a city from the resources obtained.

item.title: On the Western Front
item.description: Game Description On the Western Front - this is a tactical strategy, the action of which unfolds against the background of the First World War, namely on the infamous Western Front. Users take on the role of the division commander, who are instructed to manage various aspects of military operations in one of the most exhausting and complex periods in history. The Title emphasizes the harsh realities of the trench war, where the soldiers are faced with many problems, from the constant threat of enemy fire to the constant need to manage resources.

item.title: Mad Restaurant People
item.description: Game Description Mad Restaurant People makes it possible to feel all the difficulty of working as a waiter. The game is presented with a top distance, which makes it possible to observe the entire hall at once. Take orders, serve customers, serve dishes in time, count the guests and much more. Mad Restaurant People is a full -fledged waiter’s simulator who will not let you relax for a second. The gameplay requires attentiveness, reaction speed, good memory and many other important qualities.

item.title: Pro Evolution Socker 2019
item.description: Game Description PES 2019 - one of the games that won the recognition of fans through the territory of the entire planet - Pro Evolution Soccer 2019 is a new football league hidden in the old filling. Gradually improving their brainchild, the developers came to a perfect schedule, plausible sound and real physics of movement. This part includes several additions in which you will hire professional football players for several matches and prove that the team management is your craft from birth!

item.title: Mist Survival
item.description: Game Description Another survival game among zombies is Mist Survival. A completely open world, a unique system of characteristics, new types of weapons, shelters and the ability to create their own gang, attracted new players to fight on an open map against the crowd of enraged people absorbed in the epidemic. The main character, like all real players, will be protected from the epidemic, because in their body there is a special hormone that needs to be nourished every day.

item.title: Star Explorers
item.description: Game Description Star Explorers is designed for lovers of space and complete freedom of action. After the death of the Earth, people got into a giant-chip and went on a trip. But the ship ends with fuel, and the crew does not know where it is best to establish the colony. The game offers to become a researcher looking for a new house and resources for humanity. Gamer has its own starship at the disposal (you can take a walk on it).

item.title: Zero-K
item.description: Game Description Zero-K is a real-time strategy. The indie project allows for large-scale battles on land, water and in the air. This RTS has worked out physics and ballistics. During the battles, the landscape changes. You can even level the soil to your tactical needs. The game allows you to create funnels for enemy tanks, digging ditches and erecting embankments, hiding fighters behind the hills so that they are not taken by enemy shells, dig water channels for the passage of their fleet through land, put a soldier on a hill for better visibility and increase the range of shooting.

item.title: Farm Manager 2018
item.description: Game Description Farm Manager 2018 is a simulator for building your own farm, where the territory of your competitors will slowly go into your possessions. A change of day and nights was added to the game. Also, such cultures as cucumbers, apples, strawberries and other varieties were added to the new part. If you are tired of growing simple wheat or oats, then you can definitely change the direction, but do not forget to monitor the economy.

item.title: Through The Ages
item.description: Game Description Through The Ages is a port of a cult board game adapted to personal computers. Compared to the original party in the digital version, they take much less time. Instead of 4-8 hours, a maximum of 1 hour takes the game session, since the computer is engaged in all calculations. According to its concept, Through The Ages resembles the Titles of the Civilization series. Only here development occurs using various cards.

item.title: Bio Inc. Redemption
item.description: Game Description Bio Inc. Redemption is a biomedical simulator where a player has to choose life or death. These are 2 main regimes where you need to perform a variety of tasks. You are able to create deadly diseases, mocking a person presented on the screen. Or put on the medic’s mask and find the virus, look for the vaccine and save the infected ones. The gameplay provides more than 600 diseases existing in the real world, accurate symptoms, diagnostic tests and various ways of treatment for each virus.

item.title: StationEers
item.description: Game Description Stationeers will transfer the player to outer space, in which it is necessary to control the space station alone or with other participants. You will follow all aspects of the station. Manage and deal with complex atmospheric, electric, production, medical and other equally important technologies inside a large room. You will need to correctly build mechanisms and other objects to create a beautiful architecture, and also not to die due to a lack of oxygen or an excess of electricity.

item.title: Brigand: Oaxaca
item.description: Game Description Brigand: Oaxaca is a first -person shooter hybrid, immersive simulator and role -playing game. The project has three -dimensional low -polygonal graphics. Due to her, the title resembles computer action of the late 90s and early 2000s. The action takes place in a world where nuclear apocalypse happened. Events unfold on the territory of the Mexican state of Ohak. Indi-game combines elements of different settings. In it, the gunshot weapons are adjacent to Voodoo magic, and not only mutters, but also demons roam the wastelands.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Survive in the wild in Wayward, traveling around the open world. The protagonist has no basic specialization, as he passes, he pumps skills and becomes capable of everything. To get new characteristics, you have to interact with objects and the world around you. You have the opportunity to play as you want. The world is endless and generated randomly. Objects, chests, opponents, dangers, dungeons and tasks are also created by chance.

item.title: Universe Sandbox
item.description: Game Description Universe Sandbox is a continuation of the space simulator, which showed the real behavior of various objects in space. The game can be used as a virtual allowance for astronomy to understand how black holes behave or asteroids move. At the same time, the game will be interesting not only to beginners, but also to people who know definitions such as Betelheze and quantum voids. The gameplay of space sandbox will create objects, interact with them and destroy using Newton’s mechanics.

item.title: Software Inc.
item.description: Game Description Software Inc. - An economic simulator that allows the development of a company engaged in the development of software. Initially, it is required to build an office building, buy inexpensive equipment and hire several employees, distributing tasks between them. To get funding, at first the newly made team will take on third -party projects and various simple tasks. As the budget becomes more, the staff will be more experienced and new faces will come, it will also be possible to engage in the external design of the facade, build beautiful paths and decor items to give the office a presentable look.

item.title: Exanima
item.description: Game Description Exanima is a representative of the category of isometric role -playing games on a PC, in which the camera is fixed above the character, but it can be brought closer to detailed examination of objects and objects, as well as deleted, for more convenient battles. This project operates the theme of the gloomy Middle Ages, so the arsenal of a character managed by a player consists mainly of long -tier -fingered and remote weapons (bows, crossbows, throwing spears).

item.title: Craft the World
item.description: Game Description Craft the World is an adventure 2D game that combines multiple elements. You can explore the procedurally generated worlds, build locks and fortresses, fight with hostile creatures and get materials necessary for numerous crafts. Manage the dwarf tribe and lead them the way you want. The player can send his wards to extract resources, build structures or fight with opponents. But, not everything is so simple. You have to put them on, help in battles and feed them in time.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description Re-join thePayDay 2 gang as Dallas, Hoxton, Chains or Wolfe, who have come to Washington to rob and make a lot of money. Put the mask on your favorite hero and set off to carry out your next crime, in which you will need to overcome many obstacles before reaching your goal. Now you will have a wide variety of contracts to choose from, from which you can choose any one.

item.title: Machine Mind
item.description: Game Description Machine Mind places the player in the role of consciousness transferred to a mechanical shell after the crash of a spaceship. The existence of a gamer is limited by the world, a changed planetary virus and subsequent nuclear conflict - the cataclysm, which forced the remnants of civilization to hide at the orbital station. Managing a series of rovers, it is necessary to provide its survival on the surface of the planet, now inhabited by aggressive raiders.

item.title: Salvus: Aries
item.description: Game Description Salvus: aries throws you headlong into the afterlife. Here death is not the end, but a new beginning, although gloomy. You wake up a nameless soul in purgatory, and Rubilovo is just a memory. It turns out that your past life was not entirely sunny and rainbow, and now you are serving a sentence as a reap. You must collect souls until your debt to the universe is paid.

item.title: Electric Trains
item.description: Game Description Electric Trains is an isometric train management simulator where it is necessary to build routes so that transport can reach another station to another. It is required to build railways and organize a schedule so that the locomotives do not collide with each other. The player will switch the ruts and monitor the movement of locomotives. The gameplay is tied to physics and realism. Depending on the type of train, management is felt differently.

item.title: Ancient Cits
item.description: Game Description Ancient Cits - a strategic game based on survival and construction mechanics. The game transfers in ancient times when people lived in tribes and built the first settlements. Plunge in prehistoric times and find the primitive life of our ancestors and their ancient cities. Events develop in the era of mesolithic. Draw your settlers through a whole generation, improving technologies, mastering new tools, engaged in resources, developing the population and fighting external threats.

item.title: Animal Shelter
item.description: Game Description Animal Shelter offers the player to open his own animal shelter. Choose homeless animals on the streets, and provide medical care. Take care of your wards and make sure that they get along well with each other. Life on the street leaves prints on the body of animals. Process scratches and stick patcharies. Trinch the wounded paws and observe how the pet is recovering. Buy your patient well using a hose and a sponge.

item.title: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth abandoned long walks and romantic novels with stars that are found in other farm sigas. It’s enough just to click a cursor. The Title with a strategic farm bias with your head immerses you in the creation, construction, collection and management of a prosperous farm. Starting from a modest site, do not allow the initial sizes to deceive you. Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth is all about potential.

item.title: Clicker Clicker Clickker
item.description: Game Description Clicker Clicker Clicker begins the gameplay with a direct impact on the central pointer generating currency - clicker gold. The frequency of initial presses directly affects the speed of the appearance of numerous gold cursors falling on the screen. Interaction with these omiting objects before their disappearance brings more gold than standard clicks according to the main pointer. This mechanic forms a key gameplay cycle based on the accumulation of resources in two different but related methods.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beond Horizons Refuses the line path and throws gamers into a huge, constantly changing world. Fasten the belts and get ready for the study - the procedurally generated landscapes make each game unique. Leave the comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel through spacious deserts, lush forests, on any roads (or their absence). But this is not just an excursion trip. Drive Beond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that have to be solved.

item.title: Dustland Delivery
item.description: Game Description Dustland Delivery puts users in the post -apocalyptic world, where they have to build an empire of delivery. The center of the game is profit, survival and strategic decisions. Gamers start with a truck and gain a team, each of which has unique skills. The purpose of the game? Build cities by successful delivery of goods, competing with rivals and overcoming dangers. The world is inexorable. Users move in an insidious area, control resources and make a critical choice.

item.title: Ells Tales: Chairbound
item.description: Game Description Ells Tales: Chairbound begins with the awakening of a character tied to an office chair in an empty room. A strange device with a 10-minute timer is attached to it, steadily counting time. The player’s main task is a desperate search for a way out of a closed corporate building. Movement is achieved by repulsion from surfaces - a method dictated by the physics of finding furniture with wheels, and the main difficulty is to maintain equilibrium.

item.title: From the Depths
item.description: Game Description From the Depths allows you to accept command of battleships, aircraft, submarines, space ships, balloons and many other modes of transport. The story campaign will visit more than a hundred lands and fight against 8 fractions. Misses consist in planning competent tactics and protecting your own fleet in a series of difficult tests. In addition to the main campaign, there is an adventure mode where it will be proposed to start the game alone on a small ship and grow to a whole fleet, furrows the expanses of the universe.

item.title: Let's Build a Zoo
item.description: Game Description Let’s Build a Zoo - A bright sandbox with a simulator elements, which provides players with the opportunity to build their own zoo. It is required to install enclosures, buy rare animals, hire employees for service and much more. It is allowed to cross animal DNA, producing more than 300,000 unique rocks into the world. In order for the reserve to function, it will be necessary to hire veterinarians, trainers, cleaners, repairmen and other performers who support their lives in the zoo.

item.title: Operator
item.description: Game Description Operator is an exciting game where you become a secret operative performing dangerous tasks around the world. A realistic experience of tactical battle awaits you, where your every decision matters. The game contains a unique system of physical interaction, which allows you to manipulate objects and weapons naturally. This adds a feeling of presence and realism, without the need to use VR-Schles. A special emphasis in the operator is placed on a multi -user cooperative regime.

item.title: Schedule I
item.description: Game Description Schedule 1 puts a gamer in the place of a small drug dealer trying to build a criminal empire from scratch. The action takes place in the gloomy city of Highland Point, and users get the opportunity to expand the scale of their activities, controlling everyone - from production to sales. You will begin with an empty wallet and the necessary connections, gradually rising to control over the criminal world.

item.title: The Darkest Files
item.description: Game Description The Darkest Files unfolds in post -war Germany in 1956, in the period marked by the consequences of World War II and a complex process of searching justice. The user rises in place Esther Katz, a young prosecutor who joins the special unit of Fritz Bauer, who is instructed to investigate war crimes committed many years ago. In this role, the gamer will have to find hidden evidence, to navigate in a society that does not want to recognize his past, and to confront criminals, who are now occupied by leading posts.

item.title: Under a New Sun
item.description: Game Description Under a New Sun begins after a catastrophic failure of the ship, who left the player on an unknown planet. Awakening from cryosn occurs among fragments, completely solitude under a stranger sky. The mission to search for a new house for humanity failed, and the fate of the crew remains a mystery. The path begins in the middle of the wreckage of the vessel, in a world where the earthly flora has taken roots next to local views.

item.title: Underground Garage
item.description: Game Description Underground Garage is a car symbulator with elements of a mechanic that allows not only to take part in the races, but also to completely create his own car from scratch. It is allowed to both buy ready -made models, exploring the secondary market, and create cars from scratch. Restoring transport or pumping cars, it is necessary to take part in illegal races, showing your superiority as a mechanic and demonstrating the skills of a first -class driver.
